alert.note: Alert for Chase; Hayes; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 2:46AM CDT until June 27 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... Eastern Chase County in southwestern Nebraska... Southwestern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Northwestern Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 330 AM CDT/230 AM MDT/. * At 245 AM CDT/145 AM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Imperial, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Imperial, Wallace, Enders, Champion, Center Dam Campground, Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area and Church Grove Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 41 and 47. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.
